title: FS: Raw T207 Recruits, Round 2 tougher ones? ALL SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: Raw T207 Recruits, Round 2 tougher ones? ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
I believe these are some of the tougher recruits and am trying to price them accordingly. All are in poor to fair condition. Please PM me if any questions or if you think any of the prices are off. Prices quoted include tracked shipping.

Will consider offers, especially if buying more than one. However, anyone commenting “I’ll take xxxx” gets priority over negotiations.

Will also consider trades for T206’s.

$SOLD Easterly
$SOLD Engle 
$SOLD Hall
$SOLD Hallinan
$SOLD Leifield
$SOLD McIntyre, Matt
$SOLD Scott
$SOLD Smith, Frank
$SOLD Steele
$SOLD Zeider
